mapper.select: select tu.user_number , tu.user_nickname, tu.user_comment , tu.user_date, g.gosu_fields, g.gosu_number from tbl_user tu join tbl_gosu tg on tu.user_number = tg.user_number join( select g.gosu_number, group_concat(f.field_name separator ', ')as gosu_fields from tbl_field f join tbl_gosu_field gf on f.field_number = gf.field_number join tbl_gosu g on gf.gosu_number = g.gosu_number join tbl_user u on g.user_number = u.user_number group by g.gosu_number )as g on tg.gosu_number = g.gosu_number where grade_number = "500" order by user_date ASC
